user_request: open app "Mercado Libre" (install if not already installed) and enter user name: "tolerating@yahoo.com" and password: "Kepler"
screen_desc: The screenshot displays the Google Play Store search results for "Mercado Libre." It shows a list of apps related to the Mercado Libre platform, including shopping, finance, and productivity tools. Each app is listed with its name, developer, rating, and number of downloads. At the bottom, there are recommendations for other popular apps like Facebook, WhatsApp, and eBay. The top menu includes options to filter results by rating, editor's choice, or premium apps.
history_actions: click on the "Play Store" app located at the upper right.
click on the search bar located at the top left.
click on the search clear icon (indicated by an "X") located at the top right.
click on the "mercado libre" search result located at the top left.
action_plan: Tap on the 'Mercado Libre' app icon from the search results to either open it if installed or begin the installation process.

action_with_memory.Next Single Step Action: Tap on the 'Open' button to launch the Mercado Libre app.
